divs: Sighting Details- on office outbound trip to Amritsar. - trying to have better look of Waagah Border function taking place. - Hovering n playing with each other in the sky above border. - for short period pops out of sky, hovered n played in zig zag motion above each other n vanished when trying to take next snap of them. - got clear view when checking snaps in home in zoom function.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Amritsar
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: 4 to 5 tiny round objects found out hovering in the sky when snap taken n soon vanished from sky.
Object Shape: Blimp, Disc, Egg, Oval, Other, Unknown
